description.narrative: The Project will help increase living standards and reduce poverty in the project area by removing a transport constraint to sustainable economic growth, and improve safety and reliability by introducing new and modern technology. This will be achieved by providing efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transportation in unserved, less developed areas to create the conditions necessary for developing local resources and generating employment and income-enhancing opportunities.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Fuel savings of CNY204 million are achieved by 2014 (Unit: CNY ten million).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Transport capacity is expanded in the corridor by 7 billion ton-km for freight by 2014 (Unit: billion ton-kms)

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Transport capacity is expanded in the corridor by 8 billion passenger-km for passengers by 2014 (Unit: billion passenger-km)

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Travel time is reduced from 32 hours to 18 hours, for travel from Shanghai to Chengdu (Unit: hour).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Cost of travel is reduced from 35 fen/km in 2007 to 15 fen/km by 2014 (Unit: CNY Fen/km)

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Travel time is reduced from 6 hours to 3 hours, for travel from Chongqing to Lichuan (Unit: hour).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: All poverty villages along the alignment are provided with road access, drinking water, and telephone access by 2014.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system in the region.
